compounddef.title: A collection of types that change depending on defined

memberdef.type: typename std::conditional< Size<=UINT8_MAX, uint8_t, typename std::conditional< Size<=UINT16_MAX, uint16_t, uint32_t >::type >::type
memberdef.definition: using sky::conditional_uint = typedef typename std::conditional<Size <= UINT8_MAX, uint8_t, typename std::conditional<Size <= UINT16_MAX, uint16_t,uint32_t >::type >::type
memberdef.name: conditional_uint

briefdescription.para: Represents a conditional unsigned integer with a minimum value of uint8 and a maximum value of uint32.

memberdef.type: typename std::conditional< Size<=UINT16_MAX, uint16_t, typename std::conditional< Size<=UINT32_MAX, uint32_t, uint64_t >::type >::type
memberdef.definition: using sky::large_conditional_uint = typedef typename std::conditional<Size <= UINT16_MAX, uint16_t, typename std::conditional<Size <= UINT32_MAX, uint32_t, uint64_t >::type >::type
memberdef.name: large_conditional_uint

briefdescription.para: Represents a large conditional unsigned integer with a minimum value of uint16 and a maximum value of uint64.

detaileddescription.para: conditions, an example being the conditional_uint which one of uint8, uint16, or uin32 depending on the expected maximum value held within. These are mainly used internally within Skyrocket for efficient usage of space for indices and id values in containers.
